title: NEW CLIENT TRASH!!
body:
ever since the force to the new client i have not been able to play a game. its slow and when i get into champ select i can see anything till it is to late and get returned with a afk dodge. the old client never had this problem. all i want to do is play the game. but i can i tried to uninstall and re install and its even worse. 
PLEASE BRING BACK THE OLD CLIENT!!!!!!!!
AT LEAST TILL YOU FIX THIS ONE TO WHERE IT ACTUALLY WORKS FOR LOW SPEC COMPUTERS. 
I DO NOT HAVE THE MONEY TO BUY A NEW COMPUTER NOR WILL I WHEN I HAD NO PROBLEMS BEFORE!!!!

replies.body:
Enable low spec mod, run as admin, make sure you installed it properly.

Fix it instead of QQ shitposting.
i have done all of that. every thing you said. and it still didnt fix it.

Unless your computer is ANCIENT (decade or older), it should be able to handle it on low spec mode unless you have a ton of things going on in the background. if you have a low end computer, you can't be streaming youtube and having steam open and have an excel spreadsheet up and the league client. If you want to maximize performance, make sure league is the only thing up via Task Manager.
i dont ever have anything else while using league.
Can you give me the specs of your computer? It may be something like malware that is slowing you down. processor and RAM would be most helpful. Also what operating system you're using.
